document.full_text: novak djokovic says his unbeaten run is due to his special, gluten-free diet and now sabine lisicki hopes she too will benefit in the long run after discovering she is intolerant to gluten, a protein in cereal grains.
document.title: some tennis stars say gluten-free is best for them
lines_and_colors: novak djokovic says his unbeaten run is due to his special, gluten-free diet and now sabine lisicki hopes she too will benefit in the long run after discovering she is intolerant to gluten, a protein in cereal grains.
